metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare AI solutions power and protect AI applications with our global GPU network. Learn how Cloudflare can assist with shaping your AI strategy.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Simplify your AI initiatives
relatedBlades.copy: Create an AI strategy that allows you to consume, build, protect, and defend at scale. Power and protect your AI applications with Cloudflare's global GPU network.

relatedBlades.title: Create an AI strategy or be left behind
relatedBlades.description:
The advancements and use cases unlocked by AI over the last year shows the vast potential it has to transform the way we work and consume information.

The pressure is high to deliver an AI strategy that covers how your company consumes AI, how you protect intellectual property, and how you add AI-enabled components to internal and external applications.

columnContent.title: GPU scarcity
columnContent.description: Demand for GPUs is high, driving prices up, and driving companies to build costly multi-cloud architectures.

columnContent.title: Complex AI toolchains
columnContent.description: Stitching together solutions from multiple vendors and lack of visibility into usage slows down innovation.

columnContent.title: Security and privacy
columnContent.description: From protecting intellectual property to building with responsible AI, security concerns can stall AI projects.

relatedBlades.title: A holistic, end-to-end AI solution
relatedBlades.copy:
Simplify and secure your AI initiatives with Cloudflare.

- Move training data across clouds with zero egress fees 
- Choose from a library of popular models
- Control data flows and facilitate compliance 
- Gain visibility into traffic, cost, and malicious actors

columnContent.title: Globally distributed GPUs
columnContent.description: Run generative AI tasks such as image and text generation and classification, and speech recognition on Nvidia GPUs  from over 125 global locations.

columnContent.title: A unified and composable platform
columnContent.description: Connect, protect, and build AI with a single platform. Adopt new capabilities in any order with limitless interoperability and flexible integrations.

columnContent.title: Security first mindset
columnContent.description: Secure your Internet-connected resources, employees, and corporate network to regain control, lower costs, and reduce the risks of an expanded environment.

primaryCtaButton.elementName: Talk to an expert - Primary CTA

content.value: Many tools your organization is using today already incorporated AI for tasks like data analysis, chatbots, generating code, or writing copy. With Cloudflare's Zero Trust you can:
Define policies around appropriate AI usage
Create filters to ensure private, confidential, personal information is not included in prompts or responses.
Reduce your vulnerabilities when using third-party tools with generative AI capabilities.

Creating in house applications or features includes everything from building a proprietary algorithm for predictive analytics, chatbots, or full-stack AI applications. Whatever you're building requires a variety of tools and infrastructure:
A vector database to store and query embeddings
Invest in the right tooling to increase your developer velocity and focus on building customer-facing solutions.
Safeguard your assets, APIs, and AI infrastructure. Whether building or consuming AI you need to ensure your company is protected.
Prevent proprietary, private, and confidential data from being used for training
Ensure compliance with data protection regulations
Protect from hallucinations or inaccurate results
AI can be used to enhance your cybersecurity defenses assisting with anomaly detection and automating threat intelligence. At Cloudflare we're using AI:
To predict various risk and threat models
